comments.text:
I noticed that on words with a "th" or "T" sound, you used a z (like, in 
the word "that" you had IA sing "zat") if this helps at all, you can use 
the d_0 phoneme for "th" sounds, it makes it sound closer than a z does (I 
hope I don't sound annoying, I'm just trying to be helpful)﻿
